name: Punzzles
description:
WORD GAME FANS REJOICE!!!  Finally something more fun, interesting, and humorous than the same old crossword/Sudoku genres.  Introducing PLAY ONWARDS (AKA PUNZZLES)©® a brand new, delightfully addictive word game that combines the clever wit of puns with the verbal skill (and solving satisfaction) of crosswords.  Try the sample Punzzles below, then download the game to access the entire interactive version with over 100 more easy, medium, and hard Punzzles for hours and hours of Punzzling fun. 

Or, if you prefer solving word puzzles the old fashioned way, you can also download the .pdf file containing all 100+ Punzzles and solutions.

Directions: Determine correct matching words/sounds for clues. Then, pronounce all matching words/sounds together smoothly in numbered order for Punzzle solution. Category (in parentheses at top of each Punzzle) gives you an added hint. Solutions at bottom.
